entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
